text:
Got my first dose of #covid19  #vaccine administered this morning @belfasttrust vaccine centre. 💉🦠
So well organised and totally painless! Thanks to all those who are making this happen including @patriciafergus2 @JuliaTolan @Jomama_SR and their teams!
Brighter days ahead. 🌈 https://t.co/2mvOU5zHwP
